alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 645 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Burroughs to Allenhurst, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph, up to penny sized hail and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to plants, trees and crops is possible. Damage to windshields is unlikely. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hinesville, Richmond Hill, Coffee Bluff, Windsor Forest, McIntosh, Montgomery, Walthourville, and Midway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify. Be certain to monitor local radio and TV stations as well as local cable TV outlets for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty
